channel.title: Space Wurm vs Moonicorn
channel.description:
**When:** Mondays in July, 7 PM EST - except for Session 1 which is on Tuesday July 6 **Sessions:** 4 **Players:** 5, 1 slot reserved for [@Jesse A.](https://gauntlet-rpg.slack.com/team/U9LB6VD5X) **Content Warnings:** potential for competition, romance among player characters. **Safety Tools:** X card, Lines and veils
Space Wurm is the most powerful being in the galaxy. Moonicorn is the ultimate free-thinking rebel. Surrounded by devoted friends and perfidious foes, they wrestle over the fate of the galaxy in this epic science fantasy tale of adventure, romance, and rivalry.
Two players will portray Space Wurm and Moonicorn. The other players may select a specialized playbook (The Lover, Mogul, Other, or Spy) or a science fantasy version of a Dungeon World playbook.
The first session will be devoted to creating characters and defining the sectors of galactic society (Aliens, Cybernetics, Imperial Throne, Interstellar Transport, Religion, Secret Police, and The Spice).
One player slot is reserved for Jesse A (who will get first choice of playbook since this series is prompted at his request).
Safety tools: X Card, Lines and veils.
CW: potential for competition, romance among player characters.
Session 1: [date=2021-07-06 time=19:00:00 timezone="America/New_York"] → [date=2021-07-06 time=22:00:00 timezone="America/New_York"] https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-McMVBRbCHAIssbD_-7-
Session 2: [date=2021-07-12 time=19:00:00 timezone="America/New_York"] → [date=2021-07-12 time=22:00:00 timezone="America/New_York"] https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-McMVKb5evFp9yEjMzZJ
Session 3: [date=2021-07-19 time=19:00:00 timezone="America/New_York"] → [date=2021-07-19 time=22:00:00 timezone="America/New_York"] https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-McMVQExt52BSMUUXOHJ
Session 4: [date=2021-07-26 time=19:00:00 timezone="America/New_York"] → [date=2021-07-26 time=22:00:00 timezone="America/New_York"] https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-McMVV9V4dxE_23Z3e72

@mmdozer wrote:

Thanks for signing up! I’ll email info to all the players, including a character keeper and video link

item.title: Space Wurm vs Moonicorn
item.dc:creator: @pizzazzeria
item.description:
@pizzazzeria wrote:

Hey! I joined the Gauntlet forums about a year ago, but this is the first time I’ve been able to sign up for a game. I’ve read Space Wurm vs. Moonicorn and think it sounds amazing. Was a while ago and my memory is hazy on mechanics, etc.

Anything I should do to prep for the session? Will there be a zoom link or something later?

Read full topic
